d1_flags: 1. goto C838B9 if TEMP_9 is set
d1_text:
Npc0952:
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½*Wheeze, wheeze*...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Aren't you [PRINT_NAME NESS]...?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...I can't see too well...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Everything's blurry...[PAUSE 20]  You are [PRINT_NAME NESS], aren't you?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's me, we met in Twoson...[PAUSE 20]  Everdred from Burglin Park.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You must remember.[PAUSE 20]  I'm the best thief around.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½That... Carpainter in Happy Happy Village was hiding something...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½*wheeze, wheeze*... strange.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I stole it, and thought about selling it in the big city...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½An old, city-wise man called it Mani Mani.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's a strange-colored, doll-looking thing.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Ohh... *wheeze*,[PAUSE 20][LINE_BREAK]
  I'm in pain.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...and[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Monotoli tricked me and stole it...[PAUSE 30] from me![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½He tricked a thief![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½He wanted me out of the way because I know his secret...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½He gets his evil power from that statue![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Listen![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll tell you only once.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½At the cafe,[PAUSE 15] check...[PAUSE 15] behind...[PAUSE 15] the counter...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...*Gasp*...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_9 L_C838B9]
[SET_FLAG TEMP_9]
ï¿½I said I'd tell you only once...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½But if you insist, I'll tell you once more...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...*gasp, gasp*[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do[PAUSE 5] do[PAUSE 5] do you wanna hear it again?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
[LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO Npc0952 L_C83957]
[GOTO L_C83957]
; $C838B9
L_C838B9:
ï¿½I've told you twice already...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½But if you wanna hear one more time...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll tell you once more...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½D...[PAUSE 15] D...[PAUSE 15] do... you wanna hear it again?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
[LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C8392F L_C83957]
[GOTO L_C83957]
; $C8392F
L_C8392F:
ï¿½I'm not that nice of a guy.[PAUSE 20]  Besides.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm slipping away...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
; $C83957
L_C83957:
ï¿½...Before I go, here's my last haiku poem:[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½When on your way out[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Be sure that you say goodbye[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½then lock the door tight.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½This is my final request...[PAUSE 20][LINE_BREAK]
  Don't follow me.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I must be on my way...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Whoa...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½So...[PAUSE 15] long![HALT][SET_FLAG TALKED_TO_DYING_EVERDRED]
[CLR_FLAG EVERDRED_OUTSIDE_CAFE]
[GOSUB L_C8983B]
[END]
